overview: You+Me are a folk music duo consisting of Canadian musician-singer-songwriter Dallas Green, better known as City and Colour, and American singer-songwriter Alecia Moore, better known as Pink. This accoustic show was recorded in 9 october 2014 in Santa Monica, CA, for their debut album, Rose Ave., and aired in 13 december on Palladia network in its entirety.
title: You+Me - Live From Santa Monica
